meanings.definition: To form or develop an epithelium.
meanings.sent1: The skin will epithelize to protect the wound.
meanings.sent2: The cells epithelize to create a barrier.
meanings.sent3: The tiny cells decided to epithelize and become a strong shield.
meanings.sent4: Like a painter, the body can epithelize a new layer of protection.
meanings.sent5: Imagine your skin can magically epithelize to heal itself instantly.

meanings.sent1: The process will epithelize the tissue into a protective layer.
meanings.sent2: The treatment can epithelize the damaged area effectively.
meanings.sent3: The potion seemed to epithelize the skin into a shiny surface.
meanings.sent4: Her words had the power to epithelize his heart into a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The magic spell could epithelize the stone into a living creature.
